lead_paragraph: BASS--Susan, on December 29, 2013. 75 years old. Daughter of the late Harry and Yetta Wagonfeld. She was the beloved wife of Walter, who predeceased her in 2007. She is survived by her loving children Betty Dwoskin Sternlicht, Marjorie Knechtel and Peter Dwoskin, sons-in-law Elliot Sternlicht and Peter Knechtel, daughter-in-law Sara Corello and brother Samuel Wagonfeld. Adoring grandmother of Harry and Asher Dwoskin and James Sternlicht. May her memory be a blessing.
